<script setup>
import axios from 'axios'

const makeRequest = () => {
  try {
    const response = await axios.post('https://aip.baidubce.com/oauth/2.0/token?client_id=hQECB6a2zwIgBb6qb7geKhvR&client_secret=xAmNLcLqR6jemYhnLGGHKw3C5VZjG1G4&grant_type=client_credentials', {
      headers: {
        'Content-Type': 'application/json',
        'Accept': 'application/json'
      }
    })
    console.log(response.data)
  } catch (error) {
    console.error(error)
  }
  // const url = 'api'+light.id.toString()+'/led_'+light.id.toString()
  // const data = {
  //   button: light.isOn
  // };
  // const config = {
  //   params: data
  // }
  // axios.post(url, data, config).then(response => {
  //   console.log(response.data)
  // })
}
</script>

<template>
  <button @click="makeRequest">Make Request</button>
</template>
